name: Terrordrome: Reign of the Legends
description:
This is the demo of Terrordrome: Reign of the legends.

We want to give everyone the opportunity to test our demo.. It comes with 2 complete characters and one stage.

The move and combo list can be accessed once you're inside the game.
You can test the multiplayer mode with the current netplay system (GGPO netplay is not yet integrated in this demo).

Remember to support us on Kickstarter!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/818587200/terrordrome-reign-of-the-legends

Please give us your feedback and leave comments!
Enjoy!
